maqras.text: They ask you, “Is that true?” Say, “Yes, by my Lord, it is true, and you cannot escape it.”

Every soul that has sinned, if it could possess all that is on earth, could not give it in ransom. They would declare repentance when they see the penalty, but the judgment between them will be with justice, and no wrong will be done to them
Is it not that to God belongs all that is in the heavens and on earth? Is it not that God's promise is surely true? Yet most of them do not understand
It is He Who gives life and takes it, and to Him will you all be brought back
O humanity, there has come to you direction from your Lord and healing for your hearts. And for those who believe, it is guidance and mercy
Say, “In the bounty of God, and in His mercy, in those let them rejoice.” That is better than what they hoard

Say, “See what God has sent down to you for sustenance? Yet you hold forbidden some of it and some things permissible.” Say, “Has God indeed permitted you to do this, or do you create things to attribute to God.”
And what do they think, those who invent lies against God, of the Day of Accountability? Indeed God is full of bounty to humanity, but most of them are ungrateful

In whatever activity you may be engaged, and whatever portion you may be reciting from the Quran, and whatever deed you may be doing, We witness it, when you are deeply engaged in it. Nothing is hidden from your Lord, not even something the weight of an atom on the earth or in heaven. The least and the greatest of these things are recorded in a clear record
Behold, on the friends of God there is no fear, nor will they grieve
Those who believe and guard against wrong
For them is good news, in the life of the present and in the hereafter. No change can there be in the words of God. This is indeed the ultimate accomplishment
Do not let their speech grieve you. All power and honor belong to God. It is He Who hears and knows all things

Behold, to God belong all creatures in the heavens and on earth. What do they follow, those who worship as His partners things other than God? They follow nothing but their desires, and they do nothing but lie
He is the One Who has made for you the night that you may rest therein, and the day to make things visible, indeed in this are signs for those who listen
They say, “God has taken a son, glory is to him.” No, He is Self-Sufficient. His are all things in the heavens and on earth. No permission do you have for this. Do you say about God what you know not
Say, “Those who create a lie against God will never prosper.”
They will find enjoyment in the present, then to Us will be their return, and then will We make them taste the severest penalty for their blasphemy
